attributes.action: Parties must disclose exact spending cuts during General Election campaign
attributes.additional_details: We the people demand that all political parties must disclose to the public exactly what departmental and state benefit cuts they plan on making should they win the 2015 General Election and how much they plan to cut by. This disclosure must be full, frank and transparent in order for the public to be able to assess carefully each parties plans.

rejection.details: This is not a matter for HM Government, this would be a matter for the individual parties.
